title: Evening Brief | 24 Dec 2023, Evening Brief, Kerala, India
text: Representative image | Photo: AFP Retired SSP shot dead by terrorists at J-K's Baramulla mosque A 72-year-old retired police officer, who was the local "muezzin", was shot dead by terrorists while he was giving “azaan” – the call for prayer -- from a mosque in Jammu and Kashmir's Baramulla district on Sunday, police said... [Read More](https://english.mathrubhumi.com/news/india/retired-ssp-shot-dead-by-terrorists-at-j-k-s-baramulla-mosque-1.9182675) WHO asks countries to scale up surveillance, protective measures amid surge in Covid cases The World Health Organization has urged the countries in the Southeast Asia Region to strengthen surveillance and asked people to take protective measures in view of rising cases of respiratory diseases including influenza and Covid sub-variant JN.1, according to a press release... [Read More](https://english.mathrubhumi.com/features/health/who-asks-countries-to-scale-up-surveillance-protective-measures-amid-surge-in-covid-cases-1.9182668) Oppn leader calls Kerala CM a coward, arrogant over police action during Cong protest The World Health Organization has urged the countries in the Southeast Asia Region to strengthen surveillance and asked people to take protective measures in view of rising cases of respiratory diseases including influenza and Covid sub-variant JN.1, according to a press release... [Read More](https://english.mathrubhumi.com/news/kerala/opposition-leader-calls-kerala-cm-a-coward-arrogant-over-police-action-during-cong-protest-1.9182658) Kadannappalli Ramachandran and Ganesh Kumar to cabinet: Swearing-in on December 29 As part of the agreed cabinet reshuffling, K.B. Ganesh Kumar and Kadannappalli Ramachandran, projected cabinet ministers in the current LDF government for the last 2.5 years, are expected to be sworn in on December 29. The ceremony will be held on December 29...
